sections.heading: National Guard; duties.The Nebraska National Guard shall provide to its members a list of their rights under sections 55-702 and 55-703 and under the federal Servicemembers Civil Relief Act

sections.text:
55-704.Nebraska National Guard; duties.

The Nebraska National Guard shall provide to its members a list of their rights under sections 55-702 and 55-703 and under the federal Servicemembers Civil Relief Act.

SourceLaws 2018, LB682, ยง 4.
